rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0001
rows.name:
All right, listen up:
We found something in Noctilum thanks to FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0002
rows.name:
That's northwest of here, Rook.
Looks like a piece of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0003
rows.name: That's great news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0004
rows.name: Damn right. Look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0005
rows.name: Ohhh, friends mean Nightglow Woods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0005_2
rows.name:
Is that what the Nopon call it?[ST:page p1=50 ]We didn't have names for anything here
so we've been using Noctilum for that whole region.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0005_3
rows.name: Well, that a silly name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0005_4
rows.name: And "Nightglow Woods" isn't?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0005_5
rows.name: Moving on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0005_6
rows.name: Right, sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0006
rows.name: According to the Pathfinders' report,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0007
rows.name:
there's a large number of indigens in the area—
but thankfully no sign of any intelligent lifeforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0008
rows.name: No no, that wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0009
rows.name: Nopon visit Nightglow Woods all the time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yeah, well, like I said, no "intelligent" lifeforms
have been reported. But it never hurts to be cautious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0011
rows.name: Friends patronize Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0012
rows.name: Nopon proud and brave people, with rich history, you know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0013
rows.name: Pipe down, Small Fry—or I'll make that nickname come true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0014
rows.name: We'll have you check in with Lao's team first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0015
rows.name: They're already on assignment, installing probes in the area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
We don't have a fix on the Lifehold signal—
just a general direction. See if they've got more info.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04040100_MSG0017
rows.name: Got it.[ST:wait ]
